title: Project Katarina Grievous wounds animation @Riot KateyKhaos

embed.description: Short video showing off the PROJECT: Katarina Q + W changes included in 7/14 PBE, including W's movement speed having a new vfx. http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/07/714-pbe-update.html

body:
Thank you so much, for making this amazing skin for Katarina. Also, her Sinister Steel and bouncing blades are so much easier to see. They were so hard to see before. Any chance of changing her Grievous wounds animation in her Project Skin? Also some parts of her voice over, are so loud and have bad quality are you currently working on it?

Thanks!

replies.body: We try to keep status effects equal across the board so they don't impact gameplay clarity, which is why we aren't changing Grievous Wounds for PROJECT: Katarina. To my knowledge, they are still making minor tweaks to her VO processing.
Animations that convey status effects are global and do not change. It obscures clarity
